what: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters with provider-level Confounding Factors — empirical_null_CF_prov
title: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters with provider-level Confounding Factors — empirical_null_CF_prov
text: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters provider-level Confounding Factors

title: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters with provider-level Confounding Factors — empirical_null_CF_prov
code: empirical_null_CF_prov(   Obs,   Exp,   W,   p.grid = seq(0.4, 0.999, 0.001),   cutoff = 0.975,   family = "poisson" )

title: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters with provider-level Confounding Factors — empirical_null_CF_prov
text: Obs Numeric vector observed counts Exp Numeric vector expected counts W TBD p.grid Numeric vector candidate \(p_0\) values grid search. Default: seq(0.4, 0.999, 0.001). cutoff Numeric scalar (0,1); quantile used form initial truncation bounds. Default: 0.975. family Character scalar; model family. Supported: "poisson" (default) "approx poisson".

title: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters with provider-level Confounding Factors — empirical_null_CF_prov
text: list elements: nu_hat Estimated coefficient vector \(\hat{\nu}\) (length P). sig2_hat Estimated variance component \(\hat{\sigma}^2\). p0 Selected null proportion \(p_0\) (grid minimum). nu_var Estimated covariance matrix \(\hat{\nu}\). W centered design matrix used fitting. (unnamed) Integer indices observations outside truncation window (.e., Z_FE < aorig Z_FE > borig).

what: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Confounding Factors — empirical_null_ind_CF
title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Confounding Factors — empirical_null_ind_CF
text: Estimates parameters individualized empirical null model explicitly accounts confounding factors (x_bar).

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Confounding Factors — empirical_null_ind_CF
code: empirical_null_ind_CF(   z,   n,   x_bar,   p_grid = seq(0.8, 0.999, 0.005),   phi_grid = seq(0.01, 5, 0.01),   cutoff = 0.95,   sigma_est,   range )

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Confounding Factors — empirical_null_ind_CF
text: z numeric vector Z-scores. n numeric vector effective sample sizes corresponding Z-score. x_bar numeric matrix vector confounders. row corresponds observation z. p_grid numeric vector specifying grid null proportions (p0) search. Defaults sequence 0.8 0.999. phi_grid numeric vector specifying grid variance component (phi) search. Defaults sequence 0.01 5. cutoff numeric value specifying quantile truncation interval width. Defaults 0.95. sigma_est Optional. pre-estimated standard deviation. provided, defines uniform width truncation interval. range Optional. parameter define sample-size-dependent width truncation interval. Takes precedence sigma_est.

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Confounding Factors — empirical_null_ind_CF
text: list containing final estimated parameters: zeta numeric vector containing estimated coefficients confounders x_bar. phi estimated variance component phi. Note: raw phi, square root. p0 estimated null proportion p0.

what: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters (CRE Model) — empirical_null_ind_CF_CRE
title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters (CRE Model) — empirical_null_ind_CF_CRE
text: Estimates null proportion (p0) variance component (phi) individualized empirical null model.

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters (CRE Model) — empirical_null_ind_CF_CRE
code: empirical_null_ind_CF_CRE(   z,   n,   p_grid = seq(0.8, 0.999, 0.005),   phi_grid = seq(0.01, 5, 0.01),   cutoff = 0.95,   sigma_est,   range )

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters (CRE Model) — empirical_null_ind_CF_CRE
text: z numeric vector Z-scores. n numeric vector effective sample sizes corresponding Z-score. p_grid numeric vector specifying grid null proportions (p0) search. Defaults sequence 0.8 0.999. phi_grid numeric vector specifying grid variance component (phi) search. Defaults sequence 0.01 5. cutoff numeric value specifying quantile truncation interval width. Defaults 0.95. sigma_est Optional. pre-estimated standard deviation. provided, defines uniform truncation interval Z-scores. range Optional. parameter define sample-size-dependent truncation interval. Takes precedence sigma_est.

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters (CRE Model) — empirical_null_ind_CF_CRE
text: list containing estimated parameters: phi square root estimated variance component phi. p estimated null proportion p0.

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters (CRE Model) — empirical_null_ind_CF_CRE
text: truncation interval defining null set determined following priority: range provided, sample-size-dependent interval used. range missing sigma_est provided, uniform interval used. missing, range estimated using robust regression.

what: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters for Poisson Outcomes — empirical_null_ind_CF_pois
title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters for Poisson Outcomes — empirical_null_ind_CF_pois
text: Estimates parameters individualized empirical null model accounts confounding factors (x_bar), tailored data Poisson Outcomes. function estimates confounder coefficients (zeta), variance component (phi), null proportion (p0).

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters for Poisson Outcomes — empirical_null_ind_CF_pois
code: empirical_null_ind_CF_pois(   z,   E,   E_2,   x_bar,   p_grid = seq(0.8, 0.999, 0.005),   phi_grid = seq(0.01, 5, 0.01),   cutoff = 0.95,   sigma_est,   range )

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters for Poisson Outcomes — empirical_null_ind_CF_pois
text: z numeric vector Z-scores. E numeric vector, \(E_i = \sum_j \exp(X_{ij}^T \beta)\). E_2 numeric vector, \(E_i^{(2)} = \sum_j \exp(X_{ij}^T \beta)^2\). x_bar numeric matrix vector confounders. row corresponds observation z. p_grid numeric vector specifying grid null proportions (p0) search. Defaults sequence 0.8 0.999. phi_grid numeric vector specifying grid variance component (phi) search. Defaults sequence 0.01 5. cutoff numeric value specifying quantile truncation interval width. Defaults 0.95. sigma_est Optional. pre-estimated standard deviation. provided, defines uniform width truncation interval. range Optional. parameter define sample-size-dependent width truncation interval. Takes precedence sigma_est.

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters for Poisson Outcomes — empirical_null_ind_CF_pois
text: list containing final estimated parameters: zeta numeric vector containing estimated coefficients confounders x_bar. phi estimated variance component phi. Note: raw phi, square root. p0 estimated null proportion p0.

what: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters for the Poisson Exact Models — empirical_null_ind_pois
title: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters for the Poisson Exact Models — empirical_null_ind_pois
text: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters Poisson Exact Models

title: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters for the Poisson Exact Models — empirical_null_ind_pois
code: empirical_null_ind_pois(   Z,   Xbar,   E,   E2,   p_grid = seq(0.8, 0.99, 0.005),   cutoff = 0.95 )

title: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters for the Poisson Exact Models — empirical_null_ind_pois
text: Z numeric vector observed Z-scores. Xbar numeric matrix (n_clusters × p) cluster means. E numeric vector, \(E_i = \sum_j \exp(X_{ij}^T \beta)\). E2 numeric vector, \(E_i^{(2)} = \sum_j \exp(X_{ij}^T \beta)^2\). p_grid numeric vector candidate p0 values search (default: seq(0.8, 0.99, 0.005)). cutoff Quantile cutoff initializing truncation bounds init_trunc_pois (default = 0.95). init Optional initial parameter vector [ zeta (length p), sigmaAlpha2, sigmaEps2 ]. NULL, function calls init_trunc_pois() construct one.

title: Estimate Empirical Null Parameters for the Poisson Exact Models — empirical_null_ind_pois
text: named list elements: p0 Estimated null proportion. negloglik Minimum negative log-likelihood. zeta01..zeta_p Estimated regression coefficients. sigmaAlpha2 Estimated variance component \(\sigma_\alpha^2\). sigmaEps2 Estimated variance component \(\sigma_\epsilon^2\).

what: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Random Effects — empirical_null_ind_RQ
title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Random Effects — empirical_null_ind_RQ
text: Estimates null proportion (p0) variance component (phi) individualized empirical null model. estimation performed via nested grid search p0 phi minimize negative log-likelihood.

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Random Effects — empirical_null_ind_RQ
code: empirical_null_ind_RQ(   z,   n,   p_grid = seq(0.8, 0.999, 0.005),   phi_grid = seq(0.01, 5, 0.01),   cutoff = 0.95,   sigma_est,   range )

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Random Effects — empirical_null_ind_RQ
text: z numeric vector Z-scores. n numeric vector effective sample sizes corresponding Z-score. p_grid numeric vector specifying grid null proportions (p0) search. Defaults sequence 0.8 0.999. phi_grid numeric vector specifying grid variance component (phi) search. Defaults sequence 0.01 5. cutoff numeric value specifying quantile truncation interval width. Defaults 0.95. sigma_est Optional. pre-estimated standard deviation. provided, defines uniform truncation interval Z-scores. range Optional. parameter define sample-size-dependent truncation interval. Takes precedence sigma_est.

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Random Effects — empirical_null_ind_RQ
text: list containing estimated parameters: phi square root estimated variance component phi. p estimated null proportion p0.

title: Estimate Individualized Empirical Null Parameters with Random Effects — empirical_null_ind_RQ
text: truncation interval defining null set determined following priority: range provided, sample-size-dependent interval used. range missing sigma_est provided, uniform interval used. missing, range estimated using robust regression.

what: Estimate Parameters of an Overall Empirical Null Distribution — empirical_null_overall
title: Estimate Parameters of an Overall Empirical Null Distribution — empirical_null_overall
text: function estimates parameters overall empirical null distribution (mean, standard deviation, null proportion p0) vector Z-scores. uses truncated normal distribution optimizes negative log-likelihood specified grid null proportions.

title: Estimate Parameters of an Overall Empirical Null Distribution — empirical_null_overall
Estimate Parameters of an Overall Empirical Null Distribution — empirical_null_overall
text: z numeric vector Z-scores. p_grid numeric vector specifying grid null proportions (p0) search. Defaults sequence 0.8 0.999. xlim optional numeric vector length two specifying center half-width (c(center, half_width)) truncation interval used define null distribution. NULL (default), interval calculated automatically based median IQR z.

title: Estimate Parameters of an Overall Empirical Null Distribution — empirical_null_overall
text: list containing one element: est numeric vector length three containing estimated mean, standard deviation, selected null proportion (p0).
